casebody.data:
Supreme Court, Appellate Term, November, 1897.

Before Daly, P. J., McAdam and Bischoff, JJ.

George F. Perkins et al., Appellants, v. The Merchants’ Lithographing Co., Respondent. — Appeal from order of the General Term of the City Court, affirming order consolidating actions and extending defendant’s time to serve answer. Charles D. Ridgway, for appellants. Gratz Nathan, for respondent.

Order affirmed, with costs, upon argument.
